desc: Fade Room is a gentlemen's barbershop located in Toronto. All appointments are scheduled, cancelled and rescheduled threw schedulicity. Our appointment policy requires a 12 hour notice for cancellations/reschedules. Schedule your next appointment today with Fade Room. Our Services include haircuts, fades and shaves...

layout.text:
BY APPOINTMENT'S ONLY
OUR CANCELLATION POLICY REQUIRES A 12 HOUR NOTICE IN ADVANCE OR APPOINTMENTS WILL BE CHARGED IN THE FULL AMOUNT.
